General.Name: PT Pelayaran Tamarin Samudra Tbk
General.Description: PT Pelayaran Tamarin Samudra Tbk operates as an offshore shipping company in Indonesia. It offers chartering, re-chartering, delivery of accommodation work barge, and anchor handling tug supply services. It serves the oil and gas industry. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Pelayaran Tamarin Samudra Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Andalan Lepas Pantai.
General.Address: Jalan Alaydrus No.78 C, Jakarta, Indonesia, 10130

2.Name: Mr. Edi  Purwanto
